TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenResolver extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenResolver extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration
Public MustInherit Class SecurityTokenResolver Implements ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 表示一个实用工具类，该类可以在您具有密钥标识符或密钥标识符子句时检索安全令牌或密钥。

span.span: Represents a utility class that can retrieve security tokens or keys when you have a key identifier or key identifier clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您具有密钥标识符或密钥标识符子句时，使用 类来检索密钥或安全令牌。Use the class to retrieve a key or security token when you have a key identifier or key identifier clause. 如果存在密钥标识符或密钥标识符子句，则 和 方法将检索令牌。The and methods retrieve a token given that there is a key identifier or key identifier clause. 如果存在密钥标识符子句，则 和 将检索密钥。The and retrieve a key given that there is a key identifier clause. 当检索不成功时，带有 `Try` 前缀的方法将返回 `false`，而不带有 `Try` 前缀的方法将引发异常。The methods with a `Try` prefix return `false` when the retrieval is unsuccessful, whereas the methods without a `Try` prefix throw an exception.

param.span: 一个类型为 的 ，它包含此安全令牌解析程序可以将密钥标识符和密钥标识符子句解析到其中的安全令牌集。

span.span: A of type that contains the set of security tokens for which this security token resolver can resolve key identifiers and key identifier clauses to.

param.span: 如果对所引用的安全密钥位于 SOAP 消息中其他某个位置的 密钥标识符子句进行解析，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: to resolve the key identifier clauses that reference a security key that is located somewhere else in the SOAP message; otherwise, .

summary.span: 为指定的安全令牌创建默认安全令牌解析程序。

span.span: Creates a default security token resolver for the specified security tokens.

returns.span: 一个 ，它解析与 参数中指定的安全令牌相匹配的密钥标识符和子句。

span.span: A that resolves key identifiers and clauses that match the security tokens specified in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此方法中返回的安全令牌解析程序对指定的安全令牌使用 和 方法来解析密钥标识符和密钥标识符子句。The security token resolver that is returned from this method, uses the and methods on the specified security tokens to resolve key identifiers and key identifier clauses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当无法将密钥标识符子句解析为密钥时， 和 方法的行为有所不同。The and methods differ in what happens when the key identifier clause cannot be resolved to a key. 方法返回 `false`，而 方法引发异常。The method returns `false`, whereas the method throws an exception.
